= Introduction =
This module is an Android implementation of [http://code.google.com/p/oxenjavacommons/wiki/Property Properties] found on [http://code.google.com/p/oxenjavacommons Oxen Java Commons].

= Details =
After reading the page with [http://code.google.com/p/oxenjavacommons/wiki/Property Properties] explanation, you can see the following packages:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/oxenandroidcommons/source/browse/#svn/trunk/ar.com.oxen.android.commons/src/main/java/ar/com/oxen/android/common/property/impl ar.com.oxen.android.common.property.impl]: Which contains Android implementations of property adapters.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/oxenandroidcommons/source/browse/#svn/trunk/ar.com.oxen.android.sample/src/main/java/ar/com/oxen/android/sample/mvp ar.com.oxen.android.sample.mvp/]: Which contains the same MVP sample that runs on [http://vaadin.com Vaadin] and [http://download-llnw.oracle.com/javase/6/docs/technotes/guides/swing/ Swing] in the [http://code.google.com/p/oxenjavacommons/wiki/Property Properties] example at [http://code.google.com/p/oxenjavacommons Oxen Java Commons].
